title: cygan
author: cygan
created_time: February 11, 2023, 08:21:20 AMLast edit: February 11, 2023, 12:55:33 PM by cygan
content: there must be users here who have missed a raffle or an auction of a certain collectible (e.g. Kialara, BTCC or Casascius) or whose favorite spot in a free raffle has already been taken by another userto remedy all this, the notification bot for telegram, developed by TryNinja, has been available here on the forum for almost 3 years. some of you will already know and use this bot, but some of you might not have noticed it yet (like our krogoth last time ) and this thread is meant to address those usersi personally use it since the first version and i am very satisfied with it. there is the possibility that this bot reports every time your username is mentioned in any thread, another possibility is that the bot starts immediately with the words 'free raffle', which appear a few seconds ago in a just created thread/post - you can also set several words (auction, Kialara, ...) in the bot settingsthe bot also always reports when merits have been distributed to that user and immediately tells you the total number of merits thenmore information/discussions about the telegram bot, you can find in the official thread abou it: [TELEGRAM] Yet Another BitcoinTalk Notification BOT (merits, mentions, topics,+)

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Quote from: haloxon on February 11, 2023, 09:54:09 AMbot asks for my UID. where do I find mine? it can't be the password coz the password does not work.Click your username. If you entered your password on a third party site (face palm!), you should change it now.

comments.author: QuakerBull
comments.body: First asking for my username = np What is my uid? When using my user name again its says "thats doesnt seems right" Help please

comments.author: sunnybwoy
comments.body: Hope this will help a few people who are having issues with finding the uid.

comments.author: QuakerBull
comments.body: Quote from: sunnybwoy on February 11, 2023, 10:38:52 AMHope this will help a few people who are having issues with finding the uid.Thanks a lot bro! Much appreciate it !

comments.author: cygan
comments.created_time: February 11, 2023, 12:02:59 PMLast edit: February 11, 2023, 12:29:33 PM by cygan
comments.body: Quote from: haloxon on February 11, 2023, 10:18:47 AMon the profile-page there is no UID. that's why I'm askingQuote from: QuakerBull on February 11, 2023, 10:26:48 AMFirst asking for my username = np What is my uid? When using my user name again its says "thats doesnt seems right" Help please  just simply move the mouse pointer over your username, which is located above your avatar, and you will see your user-id at the bottom left (in the browser) at the end of the url (;u=...)another option is also the bpip website:https://bpip.org/Profile?p=haloxonhttps://bpip.org/Profile?p=QuakerBull

comments.author: QuakerBull
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on February 11, 2023, 12:02:59 PMQuote from: haloxon on February 11, 2023, 10:18:47 AMon the profile-page there is no UID. that's why I'm askingQuote from: QuakerBull on February 11, 2023, 10:26:48 AMFirst asking for my username = np What is my uid? When using my user name again its says "thats doesnt seems right" Help please  just simply move the mouse pointer over your username, which is located above your avatar, and you will see your user-id at the bottom left (in the browser) at the end of the url (;u=...)another option is also the bpip website:https://bpip.org/Profile?p=haloxonhttps://bpip.org/Profile?p=QuakerBullThanks cygan! Its working.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Thanks for this info...I really had no idea about this or others and always relied on the forum email to notify of any new posts or topics.  I installed the Telegram bot and its amazing as I receive not only my username mentions but also any Merits posted!  Thanks for sharing with the rest of the community!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Screw that - too lazy to look and find - should not even bother imo

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on February 12, 2023, 07:41:12 AMScrew that - too lazy to look and find - should not even bother imo i hope you have now looked at the bot and seen the benefits of starting it up

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Cool bot.  I didn't know of it's existence before now either.  Kudos.  Great that development on it seems to be active as well.Quote from: haloxon on February 11, 2023, 09:54:09 AMbot asks for my UID. where do I find mine? it can't be the password coz the password does not work.Did try entering your Bitcoin private key?  Just jokes...  Don't do that.  As others have stated, don't ever enter your passwords into any 3rd party site ever.  You should use unique passwords for every site you visit and if compromised like you did with your password here, you should immediately change it.  There are sharks everywhere in crypto and the fact you mentioned you did this probably already has some of them plotting on how to get you to give up your password.  Stay safe.  Good luck!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on February 14, 2023, 03:34:45 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on February 12, 2023, 07:41:12 AMScrew that - too lazy to look and find - should not even bother imo i hope you have now looked at the bot and seen the benefits of starting it up Nope  if I dont see it on my own then so be it. The only benefit is laziness and I am trying to avoid that
